Adding Organization

You can configure your organization upto three levels.By default, root is shown as the first level in the organization and root cannot be deleted. Organization recently created will be under root organization.

To add the organization, perform the following:

 1. In the Configure Organization screen, click Add Sub-Org to add an organization. The Add/Edit Organization window appears.

Figure 3-1 Configure Organization

 2. Enter the Name of the Organization and click Save.
